```{r, echo = FALSE}

sup_data <- read.csv("C:/Users/megan/Desktop/806_final/supp_data.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

lake_data <- read.csv("C:/Users/megan/Desktop/806_final/lake_data.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}

database <- full_join(sup_data, lake_data)

```

```{r, echo = FALSE}

library(ggplot2)
select(database, Lake, pH, Year, Month, Day) %>%
  filter(Lake != "NA", pH > 0, Year == 2009, Month == 6) %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Day, y = pH, color = Lake, 
  by = Lake)) + geom_point() + geom_line() + labs(color = "Lake", x = 
  "Day", y = "pH") 

```
